Our Maroon Ford Kuga is a one owner car, with spare keys, advanced 6 speed, FSH, Has Air Conditioning, Airbags, Alarm, Bluetooth Ready, Central Locking, Detachable Tow Bar, Drink Holder, Electric Mirrors, Electric Windows, Fog Lights, Full Spare Wheel, Manual, Power Steering, Radio/CD, Rear View Camera, Rear Windshield Defroster, Roof Rails, Smash and Grab Windows Tints, Tinted Windows, USB Input & Much More...
Tailor-made Finance solutions through All Major Banks *Potential buyers should call in to check the availability of the vehicle prior to visiting the showroom to avoid disappointment *Vehicles are sold on a first-come, first-served basis * T's & C's APPLY*Wholesale Prices Directly To The Public *Cash Up Auction is the ONLY Auction Company that offers you a 2-year Unlimited KM Warranty & Finance Options
attributes.title: 2018 Ford Kuga 1.5 EcoBoost Ambiente

attributes.description: At Action Ford Roodepoort, 93 William Nicole Drive Constantia, you will always find a good quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles goes through a quality check to make sure that our vehicles are in a good condition. All our vehicles must have a full service history. All our vehicles are Accedent free (No structural damage). Most of our vehicles have standard warranties and if the vehicle is out of warranty, we can provide you with a warranty at a cost to give you peace of mind. We always strive in good customer service.
